thread.section_title: Interhome AG Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Interhome AG | www.interhome.com
thread.title: Girmay Michael
thread.title_full: Interhome AG bewertet von Girmay Michael

author: Girmay Michael
title: Girmay Michael
text:
Very satisfied with their customer service.
I had to cancel my initial reservation and book another accommodation within the same company. They were kind enough to wave the cancellation fee that they stated when I booked my apartment.
I will definitely use Interhome again and recommend them to my friends and family.
